titles.title: How good is the Lord we adore

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How good is the Lord we adore, Our faithful, unchangeable Friend; His love is as great as His pow’r And knows neither measure nor end.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: ’Tis Jesus the first and the last, Who shall guide us through all to the throne; We’ll praise Him for all that is past, We’ll trust Him for all that’s to come.
